channel.title: How to update a draft (prepend) within drafts
channel.description:
I'm trying to log my work hours. I need a simple way to open drafts, type what I'm doing and have a draft of today created or prepended (keeping the title)
So the draft looks something like this:
# 20191101, Fri 13:00: lunch 11:00: Project B 09:40: Project X
